paragraph.paragraph: In this section of the documentation all of the concepts, features and structural aspects of EiffelEnvision projects are explained. This is a good starting place to become familiar with EiffelEnvision and aspects of Visual Studio .NET.

eiffelenvision_projects/index.xml EiffelEnvision Projects
A complete overview of EiffelEnvision projects. The documentation beings by explaining an EiffelEnvision project's structure and continues with configuration and project file manangement.

eiffelenvision_for_eiffelstudio_developers/index.xml EiffelEnvision for EiffelStudio Developers
A brief introduction and starting point guide for EiffelStudio developers. This section of the documentation also covers the means to convert/import EiffelStudio projects into EiffelEnvision.

eiffel_editor/index.xml Eiffel Editor
The Eiffel for .NET Eiffel source code editor, it's features and configuration aspects.

code_browsing/index.xml Navigation and Code Browsing
The various aspects that EiffelEnvision projects exploit to provide rich code browsing and navigation facilities.

compiling_projects/index.xml Compiling Projects
Explains how to compile EiffelEnvision projects. A process which is referred to as building, in Visual Studio .NET.

debugging/index.xml Debugging
An explanation of the EiffelEnvision debugger.

deploying_projects/index.xml Deploying Projects
The requirements and steps to deploy EiffelEnvision projects both inside and outside of Visual Studio .NET. The documentation in this section also covers your rights to distribute the Eiffel Software runtime and source code.

documenting.xml Documenting Projects
An overview explaining how to document EiffelEnvision projects for other developers.

source_code_control.xml Source Code Control
Documentation on the integration of EiffelEnvision projects into a Visual Studio .NET source code control repository, such as Visual Source Safe.
